statements: SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT deduction_id, deduction_amount FROM tax_deductions WHERE deduction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions ORDER BY deduction_amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(deduction_amount) AS total_deductions FROM tax_deductions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT MAX(deduction_date) AS latest_deduction_date FROM tax_deductions WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE client_id = 10 ORDER BY deduction_amount DESC;
SELECT deduction_id, deduction_amount FROM tax_deductions WHERE deduction_amount > 5000;
SELECT client_id, SUM(deduction_amount) AS total_deductions FROM tax_deductions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE deduction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY deduction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(deduction_amount) AS highest_deduction FROM tax_deductions;
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_type FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, deduction_amount FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.client_id = tax_deductions.client_id;
SELECT client_name, deduction_date FROM clients ORDER BY deduction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(deduction_amount) AS total_deductions FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.client_id = tax_deductions.client_id GROUP BY client_name;

SELECT client_name, deduction_amount FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.client_id = tax_deductions.client_id ORDER BY deduction_amount DESC
SELECT client_name, SUM(deduction_amount) AS total_deductions FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.client_id = tax_deductions.client_id GROUP BY client_name

SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE deduction_date <= '2022-01-01';

SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM tax_deductions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY deduction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, deduction_type, amount FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.id = tax_deductions.client_id WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_name, SUM(amount) AS total_deductions FROM clients JOIN tax_deductions ON clients.id = tax_deductions.client_id GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_deductions > 5000;
SELECT client_id, deduction_category, amount FROM deductions;

SELECT client_name, employee_name, report_date FROM clients JOIN employees ON clients.client_id = employees.client_id;

SELECT client_name, department FROM clients INNER JOIN employees ON clients.client_id = employees.employee_id

SELECT employee_name, department, report_date FROM employees INNER JOIN reports ON employees.employee_id = reports.employee_id

SELECT client_name, report_date, total_deductions FROM clients JOIN reports ON clients.client_id = reports.client_id WHERE total_deductions > 500

SELECT client_name, client_address FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;

SELECT client_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM client_reports GROUP BY client_id;

SELECT category_id, category_name FROM deduction_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
